desc: Largest Range of Superfoods in Canada. We are here to help you find and craft your own food & medicine You will be able to nourish yourself from the highest quality superfoods, superherbs, medicinal mushrooms, friendly ferments, hot & cold elixirs, chocolate making ingredients and more.

layout.text: Mix and match 5 or more fruits, nuts, seeds, and other select products, and get 10% off your custom trail mix! Discount applies automatically at checkout.
